Package cm.view

Class Summary
About Help -> About.
EffectWin Displays a list of prior/preset effects and provides an interface to add new ones.
InitDisplay Creates an HTML display of combat details for the players.
Library Display a list of stored Stats and allows for adding to an encounter.
MainFrame Displays the main interface for the application.
Options Defines a program options window.
RechargeWin Displays a window listing powers up for recharging.
SavingThrows Displays a window listing effects that require a save.
Statblock Displays a window allowing for creation/editing of Stats.
